title: Wet Flatwoods Habitat Brush
description: This content pack is a preset foliage density brush comprised of 115 unique meshes,  29 AR/VR ready botanically correct plants. Create a landscape in one stroke representing real-world data. A 30 x 30 meter example environment is included for reference.
longDescription:
Features:

  • 29 AR/VR photorealistic, low-polygon plants
  • Individual variations, LODs, wind and light effects, all made using photographs taken in the wild
  • 115 unique meshes for use in Central Florida landscapes
  • Editable wind material with leaf rustle
  • Subsurface scattering maps for light transparency and reflection on leaf surfaces
  • 6 ground materials for use in landscape painting and some weeds for ground surface noise
  • 1 landscape for large-scale foliage painting (recommending brush size 4000)
  • Preset foliage densities for quickly painting foliage on large landscapes
  • 1 example natural community/ecosystem created from plant inventory and plant distribution GIS data for Central Florida

Plant list:

Central Florida

  • Blazing Star
  • Bracken Fern
  • Chalky Bluestem
  • Coastalplain Honeycomb
  • Dahoon Holly
  • Feay's Palafox
  • Fetterbush
  • Flattop Goldenrod
  • Florida Paintbrush
  • Florida Tickseed
  • Forked Bluecurl
  • Goldenrod
  • Hooded Pitcher Plant
  • Lopsided Indiangrass
  • Longleaf Pine
  • Pond Cypress
  • Prickly Pear
  • Rayless Sunflower
  • Reindeer Moss
  • Sabal Palm
  • Sand Live Oak
  • Saw Palmetto
  • Scarlet Calamint
  • Shortleaf Rosegentian
  • Spanish Moss
  • St. John's Wort
  • Tall Jointweed
  • Wax Myrtle
  • Wiregrass
technicalDetails:
Technical Details:

Number of Unique Meshes:

  • 115

Collision:

  • Simple
  • Vertex Count: Each of the 115 meshes has variable vertex count including reduced hand-made LOD

LODs:

  • Mid LOD + Billboards for all assets except for clutter (meshes tested for AR/VR runtime efficiency)

Number of Materials + Material Instances:

  • 4 Master Materials
  • 90 Material Instances
  • 1 misc material

Number of Textures + Resolutions:

  • 2048x2048 - 6
  • 1024x2048 - 4
  • 1024x1024 - 67
  • 512x1024 - 4
  • 512x512 - 70
  • 128x128 - 2

Supported Dev Platforms:

  • Windows YES
  • Mac NO (Not tested)
